comments.en:
Japanese equivalent of RX700.

Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier.

6-color (CcMmYK), 1.5 pl all-in-one with 8.5-inch carriage. Maximum resolution 5760x2880. Drop size is unusually small for a 6-color printer. Not yet tested by Gutenprint authors.

Scanning should work with SANE using Epson's IScan or perhaps also with SANE's "epson" backend.

Copying should just work with the front panel of the device.

Consumables/Refills:
